title: Selected Tipos Latinos 2010
content:
We are happy to announce that two of our typefamilies, Adelle and Karmina Sans, have been recently selected in the renowned South-American type design competition, Tipos Latinos 2010.

[http://www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId\_c...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013053247/http:/www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId_content=2859&id_section=160 "http://www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId\_content=2859&id\_section=160")
author: typetogether
